reviews.comments: La comodidad del Lugar y su proximidad al centro es inmejorable como la excelente atención de Ruy . Súper recomendable !
Excelente departamento. Muy luminoso. Muchas ventanas. Muy buena vista
Limpio el lugar, cómodo, bien ubicado y buena comunicación con Ruy.
Excelente la ubicación, el dueño bien atento. El dpto en muy buenas condiciones. Recomendable
Muy lindo el departamento.- Excelente atención la de Ruy.- Esta atento a cada detalle.- Lo recomiendo 100%
Hermoso dpto, muy bien ubicado, muy luminoso y con excelentes anfitriones. Recomendadísimo!
El depto es hermoso, el barrio tranquilo, el anfitrión amable. Cerca de cualquier transporte público y variedad de comercios en la zona. A 10 cuadras del Obelisco. Todo genial!!!
Muy buena ubicación. Muy cómodo, especial para pasar unos días. Volvería nuevamente sin dudas!
Excelente trato, limpio, ordenado y muy bien ubicado. Repetiria
comodo, espacioso, todo perfecto!!
Un departamento amplio, con excelente vista y un balcon grande. Bien unicado y su dueño es cordial y responde rápido.
Pasamos una noche en el departamento de Ruy. Muy hermoso el dpto, con balcón para ver un poco de la ciudad de Buenos Aires. Volveremos en alguna ocasión!

El departamento de Ruy es muy comodo, pasamos con mi esposa una estadia espectacular, la zona esta muy cerca del microcentro con muchas lineas de colectivos para manejarse y tambien por subte, o si se prefiere caminando para recorrer el barrio. Ruy es un anfitrion muy amable siempre predispuesto a lo que necesite el huesped. El departamento es muy recomendable.
Muy a gusto, superó nuestras mejores expectativas y solo podemos agradecer el trato dispensado.
Todo muy bien. Atento, lindo lugar.

Esta es la segunda vez que tengo la experiencia de ser hospedado por Ruy, y la verdad que cada vez mejor. Este departamento en particular tiene un balcón espectacular con una vista muy linda de la ciudad, ya que no tiene ningún edificio en frente que tape la vista, muy recomendable para la próxima temporada primavera verano.  El precio y la zona donde se encuentra es totalmente acorde, también por la accesibilidad con transporte publico. Limpio y pulcro el departamento así como se ve en las fotos. Esta vez hubo un problema con el cable, pero casi que no tuve tiempo de mirar televisión. El como persona excelente, muy buena onda, y pendiente de todo.

El departamento es todo lo que el anuncio promociona. Muy cómodo, limpio y en una excelente ubicación. 
Ruy es muy amable y presto a ofrecer información y ayuda.

El departamento fue confortable y acorde con las expectativas. Muy cómodo y con los elementos necesarios para estar. Ruy fue muy amable y ha estado a disposición por cualquier necesidad. Recomendable.

Fuimos muy bien recibidos por Ruy. La ubicación es muy buena y el departamento también es muy lindo, soleado, independiente y tranquilo. Es recomendable.... Es muy recomendable la hospitalidad que brindó.
´Muy buena ubicación!!!. Cómodo y agradable invita al descanso al final de un día agitado. Regresaría sin dudarlo.
Lo recomiendo
Ruy fue Súper hospitalario y su departamento es muy limpio y ordenado
Ruy fue muy amable con nosotros, recibiéndonos y dándonos informaciones del barrio y acerca de las cosas que nos interesaban. El departamento es buenisimo! Recomiendo!
Lugar bien ubicado, cerca de los principales atractivos de Buenos Aires, limpio, cómodo y accesible.

Ruy es una persona y un anfitrión excepcional. Nunca tuvimos ningún problema con la comunicación o la estadía, es más, fue mejor de lo esperado.  El apartamento es tal como en las fotos, impecable y acogedor -aún en invierno-. Excelente todo.
Acogedor el lugar, tranquilo y muy cómodo.
Ruy fue muy atento desde el primer momento. Incluso vino a buscarnos al aeropuerto. El departamento es muy cómodo, limpio y agradable. 100% recomendable.

Un lugar muy cómodo, limpio con excelente vista desde el balcón, cerca de lugares de mucho interés, Ruy fue lo máximo, excelente anfitrión. Sin duda alguna volvería a hospedarme aquí y lo recomiendo. Una experiencia hermosa que llevaré en mis recuerdos.
Me quede en el apartamento de Ruy un día, el es un anfitrión muy amable y el apartamento es perfecto!

El departamento es tal y como se muestra,Tiene todo lo necesario para sentirse como en casa,ademas de tener una ubicación excelente .
 Ruy fue un excelente anfitrión que estuvo a disposición en todo momento y de la mejor manera.
El departamento está muy bien ubicado, a pasos del centro y de la locomoción. Tiene una linda vista  a la ciudad.

El apto es muy acogedor y exactamente como fue descrito en el anuncio. Gente muy educada y con muy buena disposición. }
Seguramente vuelva a confiar en ellos para mi próxima visita a Bs As.
Ruy es un gran anfitrión, Muy atento y siempre dispuesto a colaborar. El apartamento es muy lindo y bien ubicado. Todo muy recomendable
Me sentí muy   agradecido por el recibimiento de Ruy, destacar la ayuda que nos presto para el cambio de dinero y  especialmente por  las comodidades de su departamento, todo excelente. gracias Ruy

El departamento de Ruy es muy eficiente y esta muy bien equipado. Se puede dormir muy bièn en esa parte de la ciudad pese a estar ubicado en el centro de Buenos Aires.
La mamà de Ruy muy simpàtica y acogedora. Los dos, Ruy y su madre muy puntuales  y amables.
Saludos Cordiales

Ruy es una persona súper amable, cordial y atento con cualquier cosa que necesites. Esta preparado para todo, e incluso me recogió en el aeropuerto y me aconsejo sobre la ciudad. Es espectacular.

El apartamento es muy bonito en una zona segura. Desde allí quedas a distancias que se pueden caminar de lugares importantes para conocer buenos aires.

El apartemento es muy lindo, tal como muestran las fotos. Ruy un grande! No tuvimos ningún tipo de problema y pudimos contar con sus consejos para saber a donde ir a comer y demás. Ampliamente recomendable!!!!

Ruy nos ayudó en todo lo que pudo y fue extremadamente flexible. El apartamento cuenta con todo lo necesario, es agradable, está ubicado en una zona tranquila y con muchos lugares a dónde se puede ir caminando, como restaurantes, bares o comercios.
No tuvimos ningún tipo de problema, muy recomendable.

Excelente ubicación, tal cual lo describe el aviso, práctico y con todas las comodidades para estadías largas. No conocimos a Ruy pero su familia nos atendió de maravillas.
Altamente recomendable.
Estuvo super bien, todo deiz puntos. Los anfitriones super amables, y atentos. El apto. es muy lumnoso y còmodo. 100% recomendable.
Excelente lugar. Muy recomendable.

Recomendado al 100% !!! Ruy fue un super anfitrión, nos ayudo en todo lo que le pedimos. El departamento muy bien ubicado, limpio y muy amplio, igual que las fotos. Teníamos todo lo necesario muy cerca y el barrio es un sitio tranquilo. Con mucho gusto volvería a hospedarme con Ruy !!!

Estuvimos desde el viernes 18 hasta el lunes 21 de mayo de 2012. Para nosotros fue una experiencia increíble, ya que podíamos llegar caminando hasta el Obelisco, la Plaza de Mayo, el barrio San Telmo y otros lugares de mucho interés. A pesar de estar tan céntrico, es un lugar muy tranquilo, donde pudimos dormir muy cómodamente. La terraza es increíble, especialmente en la noche cuando se ilumina el mural de Evita. Es seguro y silencioso, cómodo para estar y la atención y amabilidad de Ruy lo hacen todo mucho mejor. Totalmente recomendable y de seguro volveremos.

Hemos tenido una experiencia realmente gratificante, el departamento es muy lindo, limpio, luminoso y bien ubicado. Pudimos hacer todos los trámites a pie gracias a su buena situación. 
Ruy y su madre son muy amables, sin duda, vamos  a repetir y lo recomendamos.

Un fantastico apartamento muy cerca de San Telmo, bien comunicado y con un supermercado justo al lado. Los propietarios nos dieron una calida bienvenida.

Great apartment with a supermaket nearby. The owners were very friendly and the location is perfect near San Telmo.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Spent a great weekend at this apartment- had everything we needed. Ruy was helpful/available when moving in and out. Felt very safe in the apartment. It is located close to San Telmo.

The apartment is quite spacious, well located and we certainly made good use of the balcony. It was a pleasure using the kitchen which had everything to prepare a decent home cooked meal!
Ruy was on holidays but we were greeted by his sister Eloisa who spoke English very well. She was very thoughtful and considerate and helped us get oriented when we first arrived. We would definitely recommend this place.

Excelente anfitrião! Nos ajudou muito nas dúvidas antes da reserva e foi super compreensivo ao perceber que talvez o apartamento reservado não fosse acomodar tão bem os dois adultos e dois adolescentes hospedados. Nos ofereceu um apartamento maior no mesmo prédio em troca, sem custos adicionais. Foi muito perfeito! Sua mãe, Eloisa, nos recebeu super bem e nos atendeu em algumas solicitações extras que tivemos (ventilador, mais travesseiros e chave extra). Também nos ajudou com a reserva do transporte para a volta no dia 1° que é difícil em Buenos Aires. Enfim, recomendamos muito o apartamento e a localização e agradecemos muito a hospitalidade do Ruy, sua irmã Dolores e em especial a mãe Eloisa.

Appartement bien exposé, lumineux et agréable, toujours venté. La situation n'est pas loin du centre et de l'Avenue de Mayo. Petite alimentation en bas de l'immeuble et petits restaurants sympas autour.

Heerlijke plek om te verblijven, we zijn ruim een week gebleven. Ruy is heel behulpzaam en communicatief. Het appartement werd na enkele dagen netjes schoongemaakt en van schoon linnen voorzien. Ruy stuurde ons hierover vooraf een berichtje, dat vonden wij erg prettig!
De locatie van het appartement is ook top!
Zeker een aanrader voor Buenos Aires.

This place is just wonderful. Ruy was one of the mosthelp helpful, professional and kind hosts I ever stayed with. He knows a lot, communication is great, you can ask him everything and he even picked us up from the airport. We couldn't ask for anything more. Thanks a lot!

Hands down my best AirBnb experience so far. The apartment is nice, clean and well located but what made the stay fantastic was the host! Ruy is a wonderful and really friendly host. In addition to having plenty of recommendations of things to do and places to eat in the city, he was incredibly accommodating. On our last day we had to leave midday for the airport. To make sure we made the most of the morning, he picked up our suitcases at the apartment and met us in the neighborhood we were visiting, saving us the trip back to the apartment or the inconvenience of lugging our bags all morning! 
Will definitely stay there again when I go back to Buenos Aires!

Our stay at Ruy's apartment was great. We had been traveling around South America for a few weeks and needed a break from the hostels. The apartment provided us with our own space, a kitchen to use, and a comfortable bed to sleep in. It is located very conveniently, very close to both bus and subway stations. The supermarket downstairs was useful. The best part was the balcony which provided a great view of the city and we caught a few stunning sunsets.

Appartement très agréable et bien situé. Conforme aux photos, propre et sécurisé. Nous avons apprécié qu'il soit ouvert sur une vue et avec une terrasse même si la météo ne nous a pas permis d'en profiter. Un peu de bruit dans la chambre avec la rue, mais cela n'est pas gênant, car c'est lointain (6 ème étage avec ascenseur). Tous les commerces et services à deux pas, ainsi que les transports. Ruy était disponible et flexible pour l'arrivée et le départ. Tout s'est bien passé. Nous recommandons cet appartement, suffisamment spacieux pour deux personnes.
Great host and place. Ruy was very easy to communicate with and knowledgeable about the city.

Ruy is such a PHENOMENAL host! I had to book an airbnb in BA before beginning my semester studying abroad and he made the experience completely stress-free and enjoyable. He had helpful suggestions about where to (and not to) go in the city and even picked me and my friend (who wasn't even staying in one of his places) up from the airport. He takes such great care of his guests and I could not recommend him more highly. You will not be disappointed.
Adoramos a noite que passamos na casa do Ruy. Ele foi solicito e simpático. A casa é bem localizada e tem uma ótima vista.

Review in English followed by Spanish
The apartment is in a good location in Buenos Aires CBD, walking distance to the Subte (Metro) and buses. The apartment is sunny, as advertised, and this is an advantage in winter. However, as the main windows have a NW aspect this would be very hot in summer.
The apartment has no phone line and no entry phone. This means that if you want to meet with family/friends/colleagues you will have to make an appointment and meet them at the building entrance.
For very important chunks of time while we were at the appartment, we had no wifi which was our only access to the rest of the world.
The bedroom had very poor lighting. We were supplied with the world most uncomfortable couch.

El apartamento esta en una buena posicion en el minicentro de Buenos Aires, a corta distancia del Subte (Metro) y omnibuses. El apartamento es soleado, tal como se lo publicita, lo que es una ventaja en invierno. Sin embargo, porque las ventanas principales dan al noroeste, calculo que sera muy caluroso en verano.
El departamento no tiene telefono ni portero electrico, lo que significa que si uno quiere encontrarse con familiares/amigos/colegas uno tiene que hacer una cita en la puerta del departamento.
Por importantes cantidades de tiempo mientras estabamos en el apartamento no teniamos wifi, quedandonos desconectados del resto del mundo.
La iluminacion en el dormitorio era muy pobre, y teniamos el sillon mas incomodo del mundo.

Ruy was a great guide and gave us fantastic recommendations for all of Argentina! He was very welcoming and the apartment was clean and had an awesome view. Not to mention it was close to everything we wanted to do!

Would recommend this place to anyone!

Très agréable appart tout en haut d'un immeuble, pratique, propre, confortable, bon wifi, belle vue, bon emplacement ... tout était absolument parfait !
Ruy est extrêmement sympathique, très réactif aux messages, toujours la pour aider... un hôte parfait ! 
Le quartier est très sympa et vous êtes à 2 minutes du subte !
Parfait sur tous les plans ! Merci pour tout !

to be honest one of the main reasons why I chose this apartment was its host (apart from the great terrace view) - I liked the description I read at Airbnb. And it fully paid off. I'm very grateful to Ruy who met me at the airport and brought me back when it was needed so I did not have any headache at all + I really appreciate everything I learned from him during these trips - that always makes a difference. Additionally Ruy is very responsive so you would never feel yourself abandoned and your questions would be responded very quickly.

Ruy's mother literally pushed us into the street while we were waiting for a taxi in the building hall to take us to the airport after asking us not to step on her precious wood floor. Buenos aires was flooded and her answer was 'it's just water'. I've never been treated so bad in my life, what a lack of humanity. We were completely soaked and our luggage. She also had keys of the apartment which she used as she pleased, we were sleeping and she would just come in.

About the apartment: it clearly was not cleaned after the last guest, had a lot of little bugs that would come out of the humidity patches of the wall. The internet never works as it's shared with like other 5 apartments 

Would highly recommend to find somewhere else.
reviews.response:
Nicolas was angry because he claimed my mother (78 years old) physically abused him. My mother repeatedly asked to wait inside of the building or outside but he could not wait inside with the door open. She also offered to call him a cab but he insisted on waiting with the door open. At this point a drunken vagrant tried to push his way into the building. My mother had to hold back this man and neither this boy nor his girlfriend tried to help. Poor kid. He asked for a full refund for his entire stay and I refused to give it to him. 

He also claims I arrived late when I went out of my way to give him an early check-in and he arrived 10 minutes before our arranged meeting time. 

The apartment was clean, internet works, and I have no idea what type of bugs attacked him in the apartment. If you do have problems with the apartment please let me know as soon as possible and I will try to fix it and/or reimburse  partially or completely if you have an honest complaint. I don't understand how this person can blatantly lie with no consequences.

reviews.comments:
A propriedade é simples, para quem não vai ficar muito tempo na acomodação. Tudo estava muito limpo, inclusiva roupas de cama e etc. Ruy inclusive ofereceu uma limpeza no meio da hospedagem, um anfitrião bastante atencioso.  
A localização é boa para transporte, mas a vizinhança é um tanto degradada e com pouco comércio de qualidade. Porém, me pareceu bastante segura. A vista da varanda é ótima.
A comunicação com o Ruy foi excelente do começo ao fim! Foi um ótimo anfitrião e o apartamento é exatamente como foi descrito por ele.

Ruy é um bom anfitrião, muito solicito para dar informações que possam deixar sua viagem o mais tranquila e diversificada possível. O apto é muito bem localizado, próximo aos principais pontos turísticos como o Obelisco, as ruas são bastantes seguras de andar mesmo tarde da noite. Recomendo!

Ruy is a very professional, talkative and nice person. He met us at the aiport as was agreed in the exact time. During the way he get us lot of very usefull information. His appartment was clean and we had all we needed for our stay. Ruy was available in case we need any help. 
We recommend to stay at Ruy!

선풍기 밖에 없어서 매우 더웠습니다.
그렇다고 창문을 열면 벌레가 들어왔어요.
나머지는 깔끔했는데 바닥에 개미가 기어다녔어요.
집주인 분은 매우 친절하셨는데
마지막 날 수건을 안주시더라구요...
I had a lovely stay here, Ruy is a wonderful man who was so helpful and very relaxed. The location was great, very central.
Ruy is a great host. He offered us to pick us up from the port and also to take us to the airport on our last day. In addition he had also very good tips for restaurants, bars and ice cream...

Não chegamos a conhecer o Ruy porque estava de férias, mas conhecemos sua mãe Eloísa que nos recebeu até antes do combinado. ..Obrigado Eloísa! O apartamento é muito bom e jantamos no terraço quase todos os dias mirando o "outdoor" de Evita Perón.

No conocemos a Ruy porque estava de vacaciones, pero conocemos su madre, la Señora Eloisa que nos recebió muy bien y temprano do que haviamos esperado... Gracias Eloisa! El departamento é muy bueno y cenamos en el balcón casi todos los dias mirando a lo "outdoor" de Evita Perón.

We didn't meet Ruy because he was on vacations but we meet Miss Eloisa that received us earlier that we supose to arrive there... Thank you Eloisa! The apartment its very nice and we had dinner at the balcony almost every night looking to Evita's "light outdoor".

We spent three nights at Ruy's place and really enjoyed our stay.

Ruy was a great host - very easy to communicate with.  He provided transport to and from the airport, and gave us some very good suggestions on where to eat, barrios to visit at different times of day.

The apartment was clean, had all the basics you could want for a self-catered stay and the terrace is great for breakfast.  It's centrally located in BA - 5min walk to Moreno Subte station.

The neighbourhood is a regular BA barrio - safe, with a good supermarket around the corner, some good local restaurants and a great cafe run by 3 viejitos on 9 de Julio and Belgrano.

Will definitely look up Ruy's place next time we visit BA but will also check out his other joints as well.

Thanks Ruy for being a great host.
Very good apartment
Everything was great.

We stayed in Ruy's place after several days in Patagonia and it was the perfect place to unwind. The rooftop is wonderful and offers a great view...perfect for a glass of wine in the evening. Highly recommend!

Ruy's apartment was exactly as described.  It's in a beautiful neoclassical building with a charming, old-school elevator.  The street feels fairly residential, but its central enough that it was the perfect jumping off point for tourist sites in San Telmo and close enough to northern parts of Buenos Aires (eg Plaza de Mayo and Recoleta).  It's a great value to have your own space and the balcony was nice.  On a personal note, Ruy was incredible welcoming (as was his mother who I met briefly while I was checking out).  He was quite flexible with my slightly earlier check-in, where I was able to leave my bag at the apartment.  He was also very accommodating around my check-out, flexible with time.  They are both very easy to communicate with - Ruy spent several years abroad between the US and Europe and speaks fluent English.
Ruy is an excellent host, very knowledgeable of the neighborhood and very responsive to any demand/question/situation. The flat is very well located.

Really good place to stay, close to the metrobus which goes to the mainstation and every other corner in BA, walking distance to pedestrian area with Restaurants and Cafés, washing place and supermarkets just next to the Appartement, and Ruy picked us up at the airport for little money. I highly recommend his appartment!

Ruy was a kind and attentive host.
The apartment is perfectly located to visit Buenos Aires' main attractions. There are all sort of small stores within a fee meters from the apartment: mini-supermarket, laundry, restaurants, cafe's, pharmacy, etc.
O apartamento ficava em uma região em que tive facilidade de transporte, encontrar mercado e restaurantes e deslocamento. o Apartamento em si era agradável, espaçoso e limpo. Indico.
Ruy is a friendly and helpful person. The apartment is nice and clean and is relatively central. The sunny morning on the balcony was great.

Minha esposa e eu amamos tudo na estadia. O Ruy é um excelente anfitrião. Nos pegou no aeroporto, nos levou de volta, deu várias dicas de coisas legais pra fazer, lugares legais para visitar. O apartamento é exatamente com nas fotos, muito limpo, muito bem cuidado e muito aconchegante. A localização é excelente, perto de tudo, como nas palavras dele próprio "não é no centro da cidade, então não tem os problemas do centro, mas andou 2 quadras já está no centro".

My wife and I loved everything about this place. Ruy is an excellent host. Picked us at the airport at arrival, drove us there for departure, he gave us tips of really nice thing to do and places to visit in the city. The apartment is exactly as in the pictures, clean, well maintained and very comfy. Location is terrific, close to everything as in his own words "it's not in downtown, so you don't have the ugliness of it, but you walk 2 blocks and you are in downtown".
Ruy was a fantastic host! He was so friendly, helpful and accommodating.  the apartment was beautiful and the view was incredible. Highly recommend!

Rubys place is great for a stay in Buenos Aires. Everything you want to visit in the city is close. The apartment is nice and fully equipped. Also the balcony has a nice view and great with sun. Absolutely recommend the apartment and Ruby helps with good tips for the city

One of the best airbnb hosts you could get. Nice apartment for the price too. Ruy really has pride in what he does and shows a great love for buenos aires as well! He suggested a nice pizza in the area which was totally mind blowing  ;) thanks Ruy! Hope to see you in ba sometime soon!

Die wohnung liegt in perfekter Lage zentru(SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)ah. Die Wohnung an sich ist sauber und hat einen grossen Balkon mit schöner Aussicht. Ruy hatte viele super Empfehlungen für Veranstaltungen und Restaurants in der Stadt.
Perfect location in the city. Nice apartment, with a fantastic terrasse and a great view, which really makes you feel you are there ! Very friendly and arranging host. Perfect !

Awesome location, clean, great patio and the apartment had everything we needed. Ruy was a fantastic host, super friendly, gave us some great recommendations for things to check out, and kindly picked us up from the airport. Would recommend for sure. Thanks again!

The apartment is sunny, spacious and the terrace is huge. Even though the location is very central, the apartment itself is very quiet, especially at night. All necessary equipment is provided in the kitchen. Ruy is a great, very corteous host. Communication is always pleasant and he is a great source for infos on the city or travelling in Argentina. We had a wonderful time in the apartment. Highly recommended!
Ruy is the perfect guide and made the plan even for the person like me who could stay only for the 36 hour. He made my stay very special. Hope I can stay in his room and meet up again.

Ruy was very knowledgeable about the city and had a lot of great suggestions for us during our visit.  He was very welcoming and even offered airport transportation for comparable fare to a cab, which was lovely.  He showed us around the apartment, which had an incredible view of the city from the balcony.  Lots of windows throughout the apartment to let in sunshine and a breeze to make a hot summer night in BA more comfortable.  The apartment is centrally located, just steps away from all of the best neighborhoods in Buenos Aires.
Ruy is a very knowledgable host who gave us a perfect welcome. We couldn't have asked for more.

Ruy was the perfect host. Knowledgable about the city and surroundings and giving me directions and ideas regarding restaurants and bars. The unit was clean with great views of the city. A great stay and wished I stayed longer.

Ruy was the perfect host. He was very helpful, attentive and he made sure I was fully informed with the workings of the flat and the neighbourhood. The flat is incredible for the price, and I enjoyed my stay a lot. Thanks Ruy!
Ruy is a very amiable host, thoroughly professional and generally very easy to have to do with. We were pleasantly surprised by the apartment and had a great stay there. Highly recommended!

Ruy was waiting at the apartment to welcome us, and quickly ran through the important need to know items.  The apartment was very comfortable with separate bedroom, small kitchen, lounge and balcony which we loved.

Ruy was an amazing host during our visit to Buenos Aires.  His home is located within walking distance from San Telmo, as well as the subway which is a great way to access all of BA.  The room was clean and comfortable, and offered an amazing view overlooking the city from a 6th floor balcony.  Thank you Ruy, we couldn't have asked for a better host!

Ruy's apartment is just in the right location for a city trip to BA, the private balcony is a charm and his mother who welcomed us is such a lovely person speaking the most amazing English in all BA. Ruy knows everything about South America and is eager to share. Will be back every time we stay in BA!

Terrific central location in the friendly local neighbourhood of Monserrat. Spacious character apartment with a roomy balcony offering a unique view of the city just as was described. We were nicely welcomed by the host's mother as the host was overseas at the time.  We would like to stay here again when we next visit Buenos Aires.
Ruy speaks excellent English and is really very helpful! His apartment is centrally located in the heart of the city and is very clean! Highly recommended for anyone visiting Buenos Aires!
